double_crochet stitches in the same stitch drop the loop from your hook and insert your hook from front to back under the top 2 loops of the first double_crochet of the group grab the dropped loop with your hook and pull it through the stitch chain 1 to close chain 1 doesn t count as a stitch gauge not critical for this project but may affect the yarn quantities required additional notes chain 1 does not count as a stitch unless stated otherwise us terms used throughout at the end of every round there s going to be a note with the stitch count so you can keep track of your work easily and
